name: Catching Bullets
description:
Made in wowie-jam-3,  inspired by TENET.

Story:

The world is moving forward, only your entropy are reversed. 

Remember, all your motion is reversed, you are actually saving enemies in your perspective.

You just need to let what has happened happen.

Control:
WASD to move.
Left click a broken wall to catch a bullet.

Object:
After you kill all the enemy, get into the portal to finish the level.

If you are confused by the gameplay, plz see the demo video: https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1gi4y1M72K/
